text: Empa har’a batho ho teng ba iketsetsang melingoana eo ba e lekanyang le Allah: ba e rata joalo ka ha ba lokela ho rata Allah feela, – empa haele lerato la ba kholoang le ea khaphatseha ho Allah – oho, hoja baetsa – libe ba ne ba tsebile, mohla letsatsi leo batla beng ba bona kahlolo, ba ne batla tseba hore matla oohle ke’a Allah, le hore kotlo ea Allah e boima
